refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads an image from a file or an URL

listitem.para: A string containing the complete image file's path or an URL
A tlist which clusters the title, the width, the height and the type of the image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function reads an image from a file or an URL. It returns a matrix made of the image data in gray levels or an hypermatrix made of the RGB data of the image depending on the type of the input image.

The list imageProperties gathers : a string made of the image title, its width , its height and a string with its type. The 'Gray' type indicates a 2D matrix of gray levels data. The 'RGB' type indicates an hypermatrix with one layer for each color (Red, green and blue). The 'RGBA' type indicates an hypermatrix with 4 layers.The last one is for the alpha channel.
